text: He ’ s so here for it! Nick Viall couldn ’ t be happier for former Bachelor in Paradise costars Jared Haibon and Ashley Iaconetti, who are finally dating after a flirty three - year friendship. The newly minted couple sent Bachelor Nation into a frenzy when they announced their relationship via the TV show The Story of Us on Tuesday, May 22. Jared made Us swoon when he admitted that he finally fell in love with Ashley upon seeing her date Bachelor Winter Games ’ Kevin Wendt. Nick took to Instagram on Wednesday, May 23, to reflect on witnessing Jared ’ s heartbreak. “ Having had Jared move in several months ago, I ’ ve been blessed to see this relationship unfold.
